title: Lost all my IP (preseason 8 update)
body: Hello im making this since i quit league for about 3-4 months after coming back about 2 weeks ago i all together had around 130.000 IP still saving up , after that i didnt play for another week since i was busy with school work , finally got some time off and wanted to play more league and i saw it was the preseason 8 new runes , and new IP currency (blue essence update) which in some reason took all my IP that i had saved up which took me for ever back down to 0 + they 2k blue essence i got from a mission after joining back now i really need help with this since i lost everything ive been saving that for so long now and would appreciate it if u could look into it since i really want it fixed since this is some sort of glitch or a bug ? hoping for a reply thank you

replies.body: I'm only seeing a refund of about 2000 BE, but I did notice that you had spent a lot of IP shortly before Runes Reforged launched. The IP you spent before the conversion happened wouldn't have been refunded since you still own the champions and items you bought.
